patthana1.6:8.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:8.2: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.6:9.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:10.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:10.2: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3
patthana1.6:11.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:11.2: asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana1.6:11.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ;
patthana1.6:11.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā;
patthana1.6:11.9: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.6:11.11: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.6:12.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:12.2: asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.6:13.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:14.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:14.2: asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. #3
patthana1.6:15.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikañca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:15.2: asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.6:16.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikañca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:16.2: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana1.6:19.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke pañca, āhāre nava … pe … magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana1.6:24.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:24.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.6:25.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.6:25.2: ahetukaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe …
patthana1.6:28.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare pañca … pe … naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ … pe … namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.6:31.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā cha … pe … napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.6:34.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … magge ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana1.6:42.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:42.2: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:43.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:43.2: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.6:44.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:44.2: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.6:45.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:45.2: asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.6:45.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:46.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:46.2: asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:47.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:47.2: asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.6:48.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:48.2: asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.6:50.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:50.2: rāgaṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.6:52.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:52.2: ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti;
patthana1.6:52.3: sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati;
patthana1.6:52.6: domanassaṃ uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati.
patthana1.6:52.7: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammupagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.6:53.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:53.2: dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati;
patthana1.6:53.3: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti;
patthana1.6:53.13: vatthuṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti;
patthana1.6:53.14: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passanti, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇanti, cetopariyañāṇena asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti.
patthana1.6:53.21: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:54.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:54.2: dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.6:54.3: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana1.6:54.13: asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … domanassaṃ uppajjati. #2
patthana1.6:55.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:56.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:56.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.6:56.3: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:56.5: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.6:58.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:58.4: rāgaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana1.6:58.5: diṭṭhiṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.6:59.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:60.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:60.3: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.6:61.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:61.4: dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.6:61.6: asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:62.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:62.3: dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati … pe …
patthana1.6:62.5: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati … pe …
patthana1.6:62.7: cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati … pe …
patthana1.6:62.11: vatthuṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana1.6:63.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:64.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:64.4: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:65.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:65.3: asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.6:67.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:67.2: purimā purimā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:68.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:69.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:69.2: purimā purimā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:70.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:71.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:71.5: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.6:72.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:72.2: purimā purimā asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:73.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:75.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.6:75.3: sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:76.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:76.5: rāgaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ …
patthana1.6:76.17: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:76.18: Pāṇaṃ hantvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti … pe …
patthana1.6:76.20: saṃghaṃ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
patthana1.6:77.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:77.3: rāgaṃ upanissāya maggaṃ uppādeti, phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.
patthana1.6:77.6: patthanaṃ upanissāya maggaṃ uppādeti, phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.
patthana1.6:78.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:78.23: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:78.25: Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa … pe …
patthana1.6:79.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:79.5: saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana1.6:80.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:80.5: paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa maggassa … pe …
patthana1.6:81.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:82.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:82.5: ariyā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattiṃ uppādenti, uppannaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti.
patthana1.6:84.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:84.14: vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana1.6:85.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:85.5: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.6:85.12: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.

patthana1.6:88.2: pacchājātā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.6:90.2: pacchājātā asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:92.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:92.2: purimā purimā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:93.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:94.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:96.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.6:96.2: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.6:97.6: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2

patthana1.6:119.6: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.6:134.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana1.6:135.4: asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe …. #2

patthana1.6:136.4: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … dve khandhā … pe …. #1
patthana1.6:137.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—

patthana1.6:137.6: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:137.8: saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.6:139.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.6:142.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke cattāri, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
patthana1.6:144.1: Hetupaccayā adhipatiyā cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye satta, vipāke cattāri, indriye cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, avigate satta.
patthana1.6:146.1: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti satta.
patthana1.6:146.2: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi avigatanti tīṇi.
patthana1.6:146.3: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi.
patthana1.6:146.4: Hetu sahajāta nissaya vippayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi.
patthana1.6:147.1: Hetu sahajāta nissaya vipāka atthi avigatanti cattāri.
patthana1.6:147.2: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka atthi avigatanti dve.
patthana1.6:147.3: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka sampayutta atthi avigatanti dve.
patthana1.6:147.4: Hetu sahajāta nissaya vipāka vippayutta atthi avigatanti dve.
patthana1.6:147.5: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya vipāka vippayutta atthi avigatanti ekaṃ.
patthana1.6:151.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:152.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.6:153.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.6:154.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.6:155.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:156.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.6:157.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.6:158.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.6:159.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.6:160.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.6:161.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #1
patthana1.6:162.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #2
patthana1.6:163.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana1.6:164.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.6:167.1: Nahetuyā cuddasa, naārammaṇe cuddasa, naadhipatiyā cuddasa, naanantare cuddasa, nasamanantare cuddasa, nasahajāte dasa, naaññamaññe dasa, nanissaye dasa, naupanissaye terasa, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte cuddasa, naāsevane cuddasa, nakamme cuddasa, navipāke cuddasa, naāhāre cuddasa, naindriye cuddasa, najhāne cuddasa, namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte dasa, navippayutte aṭṭha, noatthiyā aṭṭha, nonatthiyā cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate aṭṭha.
patthana1.6:174.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, naāhāre satta, naindriye satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.6:176.1: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti naārammaṇe satta … pe … naaññamaññe tīṇi … pe … nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi … pe … novigate satta.
patthana1.6:181.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke cattāri, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
